Section.SectionTitle: TAUM-AVIATION: ITS TECHNICAL FEATURES AND SOME EXPERIMENTAL RESULTS
Section.Paragraph: C.P. 6128, Succ. A, MontrEal, Qu6, Canada H3C 3J7 Upon the completion of its highly successful TAUM-METEO machine translation system, the TAUM group undertook the construction of TAUM-AVIATION, an experimental system for English to French translation in the sublanguage of technical maintenance manuals. A detailed description of the resulting prototype is offered. In particular, the paper includes: a) some figures on the size of the system; b) a description of the underlying translation model (indirect approach, analysis/transfer/synthesis scheme); c) a presentation of the basic computational techniques (use of a specialized high-level metalanguage for each linguistic component); and d) some results on the evaluation of the prototype.
